meanings.sent1: The shiny coins were very collectible for the young boy.
meanings.sent2: The collectible stamps were neatly arranged in the album.
meanings.sent3: The collectible marbles rolled away, playing hide and seek.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a collectible gem, rare and precious.
meanings.sent5: The collectible seashells sparkled in the sunlight, beckoning to be picked up.

meanings.definition: An item that is valuable or interesting to collect.
meanings.sent1: The antique vase was a valuable collectible in the auction.
meanings.sent2: She added a new collectible to her growing coin collection.
meanings.sent3: The collectible figurines seemed to have a secret meeting on the shelf.
meanings.sent4: His laughter was a collectible, cherished by all who heard it.
meanings.sent5: The old watch was a unique collectible, passed down through generations.
